text: is a Japanese politician. He is a member of the New Komeito Party. He has been a member of the House of Representatives since 1993.Japan Times, "Fukuda's new lineup", August 3, 2008. In 2024, he became the Minister of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism for a short time. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website in Japanese. title: Tetsuo Saito
